General.Name: Huvitz Co. Ltd
General.Description: Huvitz Co., Ltd. develops and sells optometic medical equipment worldwide. The company offers ophthalmic and optical equipment comprising refractive equipment, such as auto ref-keratometers, auto lensmeters, digital refractors, chart projectors, and unit tables; and diagnostic equipment comprising slit lamps, non-contact tonometers, and applanation tonometers, as well as ophthalmologic diagnostic and surgical systems products. It also provides edging solutions, such as edgers, frame readers, auto-blockers with frame readers, blockers, drilling machines, and network solutions; and visual acuity testers and microscope systems. The company was formerly known as Mirae Optics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huvitz Co., Ltd. in 2002. Huvitz Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Anyang-si, South Korea.
